name: curvy-tabs-pager
description: Paged content for curvy-tabs tab bar

scripts.build: echo '(function(){' >build/curvy-tabs-pager.js; sed 's/module.exports =/window.CurvyTabsPager =/' index.js >>build/curvy-tabs-pager.js; echo '})();' >>build/curvy-tabs-pager.js; uglifyjs build/curvy-tabs-pager.js -cmo build/curvy-tabs-pager.min.js; ls -lahL build

author: Jonathan Eiten
